name: Laundry Simulator
description:
Synopsis

You play as the proprietor of your very own drop-off/pick-up laundry service, in this simple, mouse-controlled simulation/time-management game. Customers come in with dirty laundry, and it's your task to make sure they get their laundry back, washed and dried, at the end of the day (or face the consequences...). 

As you take in new business, your character automatically gives them a numbered tag to remember who's laundry is whose. Each day starts at 7:00 and ends at 20:00.  Keep in mind that your character can only carry one load of laundry at a time. Make sure you don't misclick when up against the clock! 

Controls

You play simply by clicking! Click on customers to pick up laundry, and on machines to start a load. laundry must be washed and dried for customers to be happy. Your character can only carry one load of laundry at a time.

WTF is up with my cat??

Your cat is *sometimes* helpful! Most of the time he's looking to get a good cat nap in on some freshly washed laundry, though. He's pretty obvious about it, though, so you can always tell when he's thinking about laundry and plan accordingly!

Development

This game is in active development and currently has no "end," unless you get enough unhappy customers!  Upcoming updates listed below (in no particular order).

  • Upgrades: purchasing more/better washers and dryers, increasing player speed, and affecting customer stats
  • Adding a lint brush to rescue otherwise clean clothes that succumbed to cat fur
  • More customer types, including special abilities
  • Cat toys and/or catnip, to distract the frightful feline
  • Customer files: get a better sense of who your customers are, to maximize profits
  • Challenges: daily challenges to up the difficulty in order to up the profits
  • Stories: as you unlock more customers, you reveal more about the world you live in, unlocking upgrades and providing a path to completion
